ResearchProjectDef.label: Vegetable Research I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the growing of some basic vegetables and plants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vegetable Research II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in agriculture enables the ability for your colonists to grow new vegetables and plants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vegetable Research III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Even further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow new vegetables and plants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fruits Research I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the growing of fruit trees.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fruits Research II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow fruits in Hydroponic Basins.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medical Agriculture I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the growing of Xerigium Plants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medical Agriculture II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in medical agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow medical plants in Hydroponic Basins.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Decorative Agriculture I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the growing of simple flowers: Astragalus, Rosebay, Crocus.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Decorative agriculture II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the growing of more simple flowers: Rose, Daylily, Delphinium.
